snippet: The departure of Javier Moreno at Spain’s leading daily newspaper is a new sign of economic turmoil caused by slumping advertising and dwindling circulation.
abstract: El Pais, Spain’s leading daily newspaper, ousts its top editor Javier Moreno, becoming third newspaper to do so; move is latest sign of economic turmoil in an industry suffering from slumping advertising and dwindling circulation.

byline.original: By RAPHAEL MINDER and DOREEN CARVAJAL

lead_paragraph: The departure of Javier Moreno at Spain’s leading daily newspaper is a new sign of economic turmoil caused by slumping advertising and dwindling circulation.

headline.main: El País Ousts Editor; 3rd Spanish Paper to Do So Amid Financial Woes
headline.print_headline: Third Spanish Paper Ousts Editor Amid Financial Woes
